title: Riot, Listen. "Ranked Rewards deny"
body: I dont see why this wasnt announced at the start of the season because I did get like 2 20 minute bans thats like 4 Leaves out of  300 ranked games played. And all of which I had no idea until now, I feel like ive been playing ranked for nothing at all I dont even get played games because they reset at the end of the season, Why do you have to deny end of season rewards for people who dont leave ranked games very much at all! cant you do it for people who rarely leave? Or something to prove I played those games something for proof that I didnt waste 300 ranked games. No im not silver yet but I can see myself getting their before the end of the season since I have recently improved alot. But if you cannot do so do I get some sort of proof I played those games? can they be added to my normal games played at the end of the season? because I feel like their is no point continueing to prove that I can make it to silver because it will be wiped from existance at the end of the season. :( {{item:3113}}
